ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... words ... to ... That s the unfortunate part.  When I camped for my mask at level 32, there was actually a level 1 paladin in the room waiting for a
ygData.messageBody:
> Heh mage pets are close to the same as a necro pet. Well I suppose the
words
> would be easy to get over time but when I hit 50 it just wasn't heard of
to
> have a 49th pet. Took me 1 1/2 months just to get the spell. Saturation of
> the market makes this game so easy.
>
> Naeeldar

That's the unfortunate part. When I camped for my mask at level 32, there
was actually a level 1 paladin in the room waiting for a carapace to drop so
he could wear it as armor. Later on that day, a level 5 bard twink came
wandering into the room to loot a mask. The scary part is they both felt
perfectly safe in the tower. Not enough spawns to scare anyone away in
these dungeons anymore... Most mages and Necros I know get there pet spells
the immediately when they level or they already have them on them...

Taneran
